name: Winning Post 8
description:
Based on the concept of "the romance of the inherited lineage", it depicts "the bonds of people and horses" that have been passed down through generations.
In response to the latest horse racing information, events to enliven horse racing life on the stage of the ranch expressed in 3D, fun to connect the bloodlines of characters and racehorses,You can enjoy the world of the new "Winning Post" such as making your own ranch
